recipe.title: Broiled Salmon Fillet with Mustard Dill Sauce
ingredients: soy sauce for rubbing the salmon
fresh bay leaves and thyme sprigs for garnish if desired
instructions: Preheat broiler. Rinse salmon and pat dry. Arrange salmon, skin side down, in a foil-lined jelly-roll pan and rub thoroughly with soy sauce. Season salmon with salt and pepper and broil about 4 inches from heat 12 to 15 minutes, or until just cooked through. Transfer salmon to a platter and garnish with herbs.
